title: Start
body:
B: Here they come!
A: Shit!
A: There are too many
B: Why won't you focus more on killing then on yelling
A: I'll do both
A: Where did they come from?
B: They followed us from the forest, I think
A: At least we got some food to the tribe
B: It won't be of use if we will die here
A: Don't worry about that
A: I got them
B: I think you need to be faster
B: My ammo is about to end
A:What?!
B: ..
[[Prologue]]

title: Prologue
body:
It starts with alarms
People running and screaming
Some, confused, trying to follow
Then, a blast
And another
Everything turns to ash
Everything burns
Not everyone could get into shelter in time
All payed the price.
